HIGHLY_COLLECTIBLE_UNIQUE_DIGITAL: A highly collectible and unique digital art offering
THE_NFT_CARDS_MESG1: SuperOne is presenting our highly collectible and unique digital art offering to the world. Our first launch is the football collection, which features 100 of the greatest football players of all time.
THE_NFT_CARDS_MESG2: The cards will come in different values, Bronze, Silver, Gold, Legend and Origin. In a series of 100 bronze cards, 100 silver cards, 100 gold cards, 10 legend cards and 1 origin card.
EVERY_TIME_CARD_USED: every time a card is used
STAKING_MSG1: Each value holds a 5% staking reward, and is based on the difficulty of the questions. Bronze will earn staking from easy questions, Silver from easy and medium questions, and Gold from easy, medium and hard questions.
STAKING_MSG2: Legend and Origin work as a gold card, but have increased collectors value due to few cards available and sharing the pool with far fewer people, due to the limited availability.
GAMEPLAY_EXPERIENCE_MSG: With our purpose-built utility cards, you can get an instant free pass via pre-load or on-demand activation. There are three type of questions cards; Bronze (easy), Silver (medium) and Gold (hard).
doYouWantToChangeYourLanguage: Do you want to change your language
